snippet: About one in five adult cigarette smokers had used electronic cigarettes by 2011, up from about one in 10 in 2010, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reports that about one in five adult cigarette smokers had used electronic cigarettes by 2011, up from about one in 10 in 2010.
lead_paragraph: About one in five adult cigarette smokers had used electronic cigarettes by 2011, up from about one in 10 in 2010, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
